content.raw:
Now that pull request #15 has been merged to default and into this branch, this can be tested by building the ign-common default branch. Without this branch, `pkg-config --cflags ignition-common0` fails with:

~~~
$ pkg-config --cflags ignition-common0
Package libavdevice>=56.4.100 was not found in the pkg-config search path.
Perhaps you should add the directory containing `libavdevice>=56.4.100.pc'
to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
Package 'libavdevice>=56.4.100', required by 'ignition-common0', not found
~~~

With this branch, it works properly

Now that pull request #15 has been merged to default and into this branch, this can be tested by building the ign-common default branch. Without this branch, pkg-config --cflags ignition-common0 fails with:

$ pkg-config --cflags ignition-common0
Package libavdevice>=56.4.100 was not found in the pkg-config search path.
Perhaps you should add the directory containing `libavdevice>=56.4.100.pc'
to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
Package 'libavdevice>=56.4.100', required by 'ignition-common0', not found

With this branch, it works properly
